mapper.select: SELECT c.course_id, c.user_id, c.course_name, c.academy_name, c.academy_address, c.start_date, c.end_date, c.description, l.lecture_id, l.course_id, l.lecture_name, l.lecture_date, l.start_time, l.end_time, l.description, l.lecture_order FROM course c JOIN lecture l ON c.course_id = l.course_id WHERE c.user_id=#{userId} AND l.lecture_date BETWEEN date(#{monday}) AND date(#{sunday})

SELECT c.course_id, c.user_id, c.course_name, c.academy_name, c.academy_address, c.start_date, c.end_date, c.description, l.lecture_id, l.course_id, l.lecture_name, l.lecture_date, l.start_time, l.end_time, l.description, l.lecture_order FROM course c JOIN management m ON c.course_id = m.course_id JOIN lecture l ON l.course_id = m.course_id WHERE m.user_id=#{userId} AND l.lecture_date BETWEEN date(#{monday}) AND date(#{sunday})

SELECT c.course_id, c.user_id, c.course_name, c.academy_name, c.academy_address, c.start_date, c.end_date, c.description, l.lecture_id, l.course_id, l.lecture_name, l.lecture_date, l.start_time, l.end_time, l.description, l.lecture_order FROM course c JOIN sugang g ON c.course_id = g.course_id AND g.state='ACCEPTED' JOIN lecture l ON l.course_id = g.course_id WHERE g.user_id=#{userId} and l.lecture_date BETWEEN date(#{monday}) and date(#{sunday}) and g.start_date <= l.lecture_date

SELECT c.course_id, c.user_id, c.course_name, c.academy_name, c.academy_address, c.start_date, c.end_date, c.description, s.schedule_id, s.course_id, s.day, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM course c JOIN schedule s ON c.course_id = s.course_id where c.user_id = #{userID}

SELECT c.course_id, c.user_id, c.course_name, c.academy_name, c.academy_address, c.start_date, c.end_date, c.description, s.schedule_id, s.course_id, s.day, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM course c JOIN management m ON c.course_id = m.course_id JOIN schedule s ON s.course_id = m.course_id WHERE m.user_id=#{userId}

SELECT c.course_id, c.user_id, c.course_name, c.academy_name, c.academy_address, c.start_date, c.end_date, c.description, s.schedule_id, s.course_id, s.day, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM course c JOIN sugang g ON c.course_id = g.course_id AND g.state='ACCEPTED' JOIN schedule s ON s.course_id = g.course_id WHERE g.user_id=#{userId}
